Website Style Guide

This style guide shows the different components that are available, and provides guidance on their usage.

How to use these styles

Colours

Primary Colours

Blue

rgb(50,100,171)
#3264AB
$color-blue

Red

rgb(237,28,36)
#ED1C24
$color-red

Black

rgb(51,51,51)
#333
$color-black

Gray

rgb(153,153,153)
#999999
$color-gray

Secondary Colours

Dark Gray

rgb(68,68,68)
#444444
$color-dark-gray

Light Gray

rgb(237,28,36)
#e5e5e5
$color-light-gray

Dark Blue

rgb(37,75,128)
#254b80
$color-dark-blue

Light Blue

rgb(138,200,255)
#8ac8ff
$color-light-blue

Dark Red

rgb(153,18,23)
#991217
$color-dark-red

Light Red

rgb(255,128,103)
#ff8067
$color-light-red

Green

rgb(51,153,51)
#339933
$color-green

Dark Green

rgb(49,97,49)
#306030
$color-dark-green

Light Green

rgb(153,204,153)
#99cc99
$color-light-green
